item.title: PG&E 项目旨在缓解人工智能计算需求和住房短缺问题

item.title: 摩根大通凯利称特朗普关税将打击经济增长，加剧通货膨胀
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）的大卫-凯利（David Kelly）表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）激进的关税计划可能会放缓全球经济，并给美国通胀带来上行压力。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management’s David Kelly said President-elect Donald Trump’s aggressive tariff plans would likely slow the global economy and put upward pressure on US inflation, flagging risks that have largely been overshadowed during the stock market’s post-election rally.】

Three months later, the cheers are fading as Redburn Atlantic tells investors to dump the coffee chain’s shares.】

item.title: 家庭债务再创新高，低收入美国人不堪重负

item.title: 救援谈判陷入僵局，Northvolt 召开股东大会

item.title: 德雅丹称加拿大公共市场存在养老金问题

item.title: 特斯拉自发布以来第六次召回赛博特卡车
item.description: 自一年前推出 Cybertruck 电动皮卡以来，特斯拉公司已第六次召回该车，这次召回的原因是一个可能导致驾驶员失去推进力而不得不靠边停车的问题。【原文：Tesla Inc. recalled the Cybertruck a sixth time since the electric pickup launched a year ago, this time over an issue that could lead drivers to lose propulsion and have to pull over to the side of the road.】
